attributes.action: Stop All Commercial Vehicles From Being Brought Home Causing Parking Issues
attributes.additional_details: These Vehicles Must be Left at the Premises of the Company, this would free up Residential Parking including the ones who break the Law by Parking on Footpaths and Junctions, Laws Need Updating to stop us going back to Third World Countries.
attributes.background: Residential Areas are Having Parking Issues for their Own Vehicles due to the Amount of Commercial Vehicles taking up Valued Spaces, no need for it as these Areas Are NOT Commercial but Residential, it it being Lazy and Why it brings Criminals into these Areas Breaking into the Commercial Vehicles.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about parking restrictions in residential areas are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
